extensionDescription.message: Automatically saves text field inputs and restores them on page reload

statusLabel.description: Label for the field count status

infoText.message: Text field inputs are automatically saved and restored when you reload the page. Sensitive information like passwords is never saved.

clearPageButton.description: Button to clear current page data

clearAllButton.description: Button to clear all saved data

emptyStateNoData.description: Message when there is no saved data

emptyStateNotAvailable.description: Message when extension is not available on current page

confirmClearPage.message: Delete all saved data for this page?
confirmClearPage.description: Confirmation message for clearing page data

confirmClearAll.message: Delete all saved data for all sites ($COUNT$ items)?
confirmClearAll.description: Confirmation message for clearing all data

toastAllDeleted.description: Toast message after deleting all data

toastNoData.description: Toast message when there is no data
